elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "The separation of powers".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Name the different levels of the state legal system.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Why are powers divided in a democracy?
elements.correctAnswer: The power of the state is divided into three powers in order to prevent abuse of power.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: List the three branches of government that exist in Switzerland.
elements.correctAnswer: Parliament (legislative branch), government (executive branch) and court (judicial branch)

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What influence do the media exert in politics?
elements.correctAnswer: As most people do not inform themselves directly about political events, they read and hear about them in the media. Media professionals decide how events are conveyed. In this way, they influence the formation of public opinion and are therefore regarded as the fourth power in the state.
